comments.author: michellecheong
comments.content:
Cheer up! I thought you were brave to quit your job (although I hope your finances permits you to do that!)and perhaps find something worthwhile during your cycling trips. You might find more meaning to your life (mine sucked at the moment - I wouldn't want to elaborate on that). I am too rational to throw caution to the wind such as quitting job - another reason is my pitiful state of finance :(

Well, perhaps this is just a temporary phase that you are going through. Whatever it is, all the best!
